巨貘通常很平静，但一旦被激怒就会变得可怕。它们长着獠牙的门牙适合用来给攻击者开瓢，貘只要咬到敌人的胳膊或腿，就能用钝臼齿把肉磨成糊状。貘具有良好的听力和极好的嗅觉，但像许多猎物一样，它们的视力很差。在与多个敌人战斗的混乱中，巨型貘可能会变得不知所措和困惑，同时猛殴敌人和盟友，或者完全逃离现场。

Grinding Bite.name: 碾磨噬咬 Grinding Bite
Grinding Bite.description:
需求 巨貘的上个动作是对一个生物进行一次成功的啃咬打击；

效果 巨貘用强壮的盘牙碾磨目标的血肉。目标必须尝试一次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}直到它的下个回合开始。

失败 生物陷入受到[[/r (2d4)[bludgeoning]]]{2d4钝击伤害}，并且力竭1直到它的下个回合结束。

大失败 生物陷入受到[[/r (4d4)[bludgeoning]]]{4d4钝击伤害}，并且力竭1，持续1分钟。

Snared.name: 落入陷阱 Snared
Snared.description: 由于它们的蹄子上扎着毒倒钩，貘无法行走超过10尺的距离。

Splayed Toes.name: 宽阔脚趾 Splayed Toes
Splayed Toes.description: 巨貘无视由烂泥或浅水构成的困难地形。

Glyptodon.name: 雕齿兽 Glyptodon
Glyptodon.publicNotes:
雕齿兽是一种体型巨大的、像犰狳一样的巨型动物，它们漫步在沙质河岸和古老的森林中，寻找它们最喜欢的食物，即河岸的草和幼树。狰狞而多疑的雕齿兽躲避捕食者并非出于防御本能——它们全副武装的兽皮保护它们不受大多数牙尖嘴利的食肉动物的伤害——而是因为它们更喜欢独处，而不是安静地觅食。尽管体型庞大，雕齿兽却能靠很少的食物生存，它们几乎什么都吃。因此，与其他大型食草动物相比，它们更有可能在广阔的苔原或沙漠地区游荡。在平坦的地平线上，它们看起来像单独的、动作迟缓的小圆丘。

雕齿兽的甲壳状厚骨板很容易长出独特的图案和疤痕，这使得雕齿兽之外的其他生物兽很容易辨识某个具体的雕齿兽。雕齿兽的视力出了名的差，即使对猎物来说也是如此，它们依靠嗅觉四处走动，识别威胁，识别彼此。在战斗中，它们主要依靠厚厚的甲壳来保护自己免受攻击。

尽管南方的商人们偶尔会尝试建立雕齿兽贸易网络，但骑上这些巨兽是一件令人沮丧的事情，因为它们圆润的兽皮很难适配人形骑手的脚或鞍具。然而。然而，平原上一些有蹼的人，包括蜥蜴人，凭借他们强壮、灵活、有爪的脚，可以成功骑乘雕齿兽。其他族裔主要把雕齿兽看作是肉和硬皮的来源，后者是很好的临时庇护所和河船。

当走投无路时，雕齿兽会用它强有力的挖掘爪赶走或吓跑攻击者。雕齿兽可以用它们的尾巴来击退较小的掠食者，但通常只是作为最后一招。

Carapace Block.name: 甲壳格挡 Carapace Block
Carapace Block.description:
触发 一个相邻的生物将雕齿兽作为攻击目标；

效果 雕齿兽转身，用坚硬的甲壳格挡攻击并用沉重的身体撞向敌人。它的AC针对触发的攻击有+2环境加值。如果此攻击大失败，雕齿兽还能尝试@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shove}攻击者。

Clobbering Tail.name: 猛击之尾 Clobbering Tail
Clobbering Tail.description: 雕齿兽强健的尾部是凶狠的武器。当雕齿兽的甩尾打击造成重击时，目标还会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}1轮。

Opportune Backstab.name: Opportune Backstab
Opportune Backstab.description:
Trigger A creature within melee reach is hit by a melee attack from one of the Graylok ambusher's allies

Effect The Graylok ambusher attempts a Strike against the triggering creature.

Brutal Beating.name: Brutal Beating
Brutal Beating.description: When the Graylok ambusher scores a critical hit with a melee Strike, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Dread Striker.name: Dread Striker
Dread Striker.description: Any creature that has the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against the Graylok ambusher's attacks.

Ice Stride.name: Ice Stride
Ice Stride.description: A frost giant isn't impeded by difficult terrain caused by snow or ice, nor do they need to attempt Acrobatics checks to keep from falling on slippery ice.

Light Step.name: Light Step
Light Step.description: When the Graylok ambusher Strides or Steps, they ignore difficult terrain.

Deny Advantage.name: Deny Advantage
Deny Advantage.description: A Graylok ambusher isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, undetected, or flanking creatures of 8th level or lower or creatures of 8th level or lower using sneak attack. However, such creatures can still help other creatures flank.

Ice Stride.name: Ice Stride
Ice Stride.description: A frost giant isn't impeded by difficult terrain caused by snow or ice, nor do they need to attempt Acrobatics checks to keep from falling on slippery ice.

Ignite Greataxe.name: Ignite Greataxe
Ignite Greataxe.description: The Graylok artillerist combines gelatin and other substances over their greataxe to ignite it. For 1 minute, the greataxe gains the fire trait, and creatures hit by it take 4 persistent fire damage.

Throw Bomb.name: Throw Bomb
Throw Bomb.description:
Requirements The Graylok artillerist has two free hands

Effect The Graylok artillerist Interacts with a firebomb and then throws it at a point within 100 feet. The bomb erupts in a @Template[type:burst|distance:10], and works as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.gWr4q4HiyGhETA8H]{moderate alchemist fire}, except it inflicts @Damage[4d6[fire]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:23|basic:true] save. Creatures that fail or critically fail this save also take @Damage[4[persistent,fire]] damage.

Wide Swing.name: Wide Swing
Wide Swing.description: The frost giant makes a single greataxe Strike and compares the attack roll result to the ACs of up to two foes within their reach. This counts as two attacks for the frost giant's multiple attack penalty.

Freeze Blade.name: Freeze Blade
Freeze Blade.description: The frost giant gatebreaker breathes on the blade of their battleaxe, coating it in a layer of magical ice. For 1 minute, the frost giant's battleaxe Strikes gain the cold trait, and creatures struck by the battleaxe are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}; at the end of each of their turns, the slowed creature can attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23] save to end the condition.

Ice Stride.name: Ice Stride
Ice Stride.description: A frost giant isn't impeded by difficult terrain caused by snow or ice, nor do they need to attempt Acrobatics checks to keep from falling on slippery ice.

Shielded Stride.name: Shielded Stride
Shielded Stride.description: When the frost giant gatebreaker has their shield up, they can Stride to move half their Speed without triggering reactions that are triggered by their movement (such as Attacks of Opportunity).

Trampling Ram.name: Trampling Ram
Trampling Ram.description:
Requirements Another frost giant gatebreaker has Readied to Stride on the frost giant gatebreaker's order

Effect The two frost giants Stride, with a maximum distance equal to the slowest giant's Speed. Every creature whose space they move through takes @Damage[(2d8+9)[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:23|basic:true]); creatures who fail their save fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. At the end of their movement, the giants make a single Strike with a +20 modifier (reach 15 feet), inflicting 4d6+16 bludgeoning damage on a hit and knocking the target prone. If the giants hit, they can immediately attempt to Shove the creature as a free action.

Groplit.name: 油蟾 Groplit
Groplit.publicNotes:
油蟾是一种矮胖的小动物，外观形似水滴，有一个球根状的尾部和一个从狭窄的头骨突出的像鳗鱼一样的脸。它的后腿比前腿肌肉更多，主要用于平衡，使它的步态和外观像蟾蜍。油蟾最出名的是它们油腻的皮肤和令人作呕的卫生习惯：它们每天大部分时间在都用它们的两只长舌头吮吸自己的油质分泌物，或吮吸来自植物或其他动物的相似的黏性分泌物。虽然它们更喜欢生活在北部的湿地、沼泽和潮湿的洞穴中，但也可以在最贫瘠的环境中茁壮成长。它们什么都吃，不过它们更喜欢小而脆的动物，比如虫子和鸟。

油蟾是出了名的忠诚和高度社会化的伙伴，它们是忠诚的宠物，尽管外表看起来有些奇怪。他们可以学会简单的命令，并表现出服从命令的自豪感，甚至在面对明显的危险时也能表演绝活。某些无良的主人可能会训练油蟾，打算在紧急情况下把它牺牲掉，而油蟾却心甘情愿地听天由命。这种专一的服从和它们缓慢的繁殖速度使得油蟾在野外相当罕见。

由于它们的骨骼结构，油蟾看起来像是时刻保持平静的微笑，这种身体特征让有些人觉得它令人毛骨悚然（或感到愤怒），而另一些人则觉得它很可爱。在世界上的一些地方，这种生物因其持续不断地欢腾而被冠以“笑面蟾”的绰号。

因为它们喜欢舔舐各种油性物质，油蟾自然会被油腻的动物，如@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.eHLDsL1LG3jQ1H6Y]{泥蛙 Slurks}，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Actor.g1htYgARxNKxc7MV]{巨蛞蝓 Giant Slugs}和拉格菲巨兔（lagofirs，AP#176《失落的猛犸谷》）所吸引。在大多数情况下，这些动物很少介意一个和蔼可亲的油蟾陪伴，尽管没有免费的午餐。油蟾在找到自己的亲族时往往会放松警惕，结果时常落入进入同伴的腹中。

Flammable Grease.name: 易燃油脂 Flammable Grease
Flammable Grease.description: 油蟾结束@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}的DC增加2点（通常来说，从15增加到17）。

Greasy Slide.name: 滑溜步 Greasy Slide
Greasy Slide.description:
触发 一个生物对油蟾近战打击但失手；

效果 油蟾行走或游泳最多10尺。此移动不触发反应动作。

Hopping Charge.name: 蛙跳冲锋 Hopping Charge
Hopping Charge.description: 油蟾行走两次，跳跃两次，或行走一次后跳跃一次。在行动结束时，他们能进行一次啃咬打击。

Incendiary Dollop.name: 引火油层 Incendiary Dollop
Incendiary Dollop.description: 被油蟾打击命中的生物会被一层依然油脂覆盖。在接下来的1分钟内，或直到生物以一个单独的交互动作擦去油脂，否则生物从@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}中恢复的DC增加2点。

Hail of Razor Stones.name: 利石雨 Hail of Razor Stones
Hail of Razor Stones.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:18|name:Cut the Trip Cord|traits:hazard,mechanical,trap](受训)以安全地解除绊线。
Hail of Razor Stones.hazarddescription: 当隐蔽的绊线被触发时，数块尖锐的石头落向绊线所在的方格。

Deadfall.name: 致命落石 Deadfall
Deadfall.description:
触发 一个生物走入绊线所在的方格；

效果 落石对方格内的任何生物造成[[/r (4d8)[slashing]]]{4d8挥砍伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:19|basic:true]豁免），或许会将之击倒。豁免失败的情况下，该生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}；大失败的情况下，该生物遭到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}（@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape}DC 17）。

邻近的生物可以尝试通过@Check[type:athletics|dc:19]检定将石头推到一边，让禁足的生物重获自由。

Hall Of Fiery Doom.name: Hall Of Fiery Doom
Hall Of Fiery Doom.disable: Two @Check[type:athletics|dc:32] or @Check[type:diplomacy|dc:32] checks to douse the flames; Athletics to do the work yourself or Diplomacy to muster the ghostly soldiers. This reduces the hazard's actions by 1 and prevents it from using Burning Timbers. Banish the demons with up to two @Check[type:arcana|dc:35], @Check[type:occultism|dc:35], or @Check[type:religion|dc:35]checks; each success reduces the hazard's actions by 1, and two successes prevent it from using Demonic Abduction. When the hazard loses all 3 actions, Burning Timbers, and Demonic Abduction, it's disabled.
Hall Of Fiery Doom.hazarddescription: While the roof is on fire and collapsing timbers crush those within the hall, demons fly down from the sky to pluck victims from the flames.
Hall Of Fiery Doom.reset: The hall falls quiet for 24 hours, after which it can trigger again.
Hall Of Fiery Doom.routine: (3 actions) The haunt spends 1 action to fill the hall with burning timbers falling from above, and 2 actions to pluck up random victims and drop them to their deaths.

Burning Timbers.name: Burning Timbers
Burning Timbers.description: Creatures within the 30-foot by 90-foot area of the hall take @Damage[(4d6+12)[fire]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true]).

Burst of Fire.name: Burst of Fire
Burst of Fire.description:
Trigger A creature enters the hall or ends its turn in the hall

Effect The hall bursts into flame, dealing @Damage[4d6[fire]] damage to each creature in the hall. The haunt then rolls initiative.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: When Hegremon rolls a success on a Reflex save, he gets a critical success instead.

Aimed Shot.name: Aimed Shot
Aimed Shot.description: Hegremon makes a single mammoth bow Strike against his prey; he gains a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll and ignores his prey's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition.

Chill Breath.name: Chill Breath
Chill Breath.description: (cold, evocation, primal) Hegremon breathes out a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] of freezing moisture that quickly condenses into ice, dealing @Damage[6d6[cold]] damage. Each creature in the cone must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]. A creature that fails its save is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and takes 2d6 cold damage at the end of each of its turns until it breaks free (Escape DC 28). Hegremon can't use Chill Breath again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Chill Breath]]{1d4 rounds}.

Hunt Prey.name: Hunt Prey
Hunt Prey.description: Hegremon designates a single creature he can see and hear, or one he's Tracking, as his prey. Hegremon has a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} his prey and a +2 circumstance bonus to Survival checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} his prey. He ignores the penalty to ranged attacks within his second range increment against his prey. The first time Hegremon hits his prey in a round, he inflicts an additional 2d8 precision damage. These effects last until Hegremon uses Hunt Prey again.

Hunting Shot.name: Hunting Shot
Hunting Shot.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect Hegremon makes two mammoth bow Strikes against his prey. If both hit, combine their damage for the purposes of resistances and weaknesses. His multiple attack penalty applies to each Strike normally.

Ice Stride.name: Ice Stride
Ice Stride.description: Hegremon isn't impeded by difficult terrain caused by snow or ice, nor does he need to attempt Acrobatics checks to keep from falling on slippery ice.

Nature's Edge.name: Nature's Edge
Nature's Edge.description: Creatures in natural difficult terrain or on natural uneven ground are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to Hegremon.

Penetrating Shot.name: Penetrating Shot
Penetrating Shot.description: Hegremon chooses a target that's giving lesser cover to his prey and makes a mammoth bow Strike against the chosen target and his prey. This attack ignores lesser cover the chosen target provides his prey. Hegremon rolls damage twice and applies it to each creature he hits. A Penetrating Shot counts as two attacks for his multiple attack penalty.

Hobji.name: 霍布吉 Hobji

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Disease and P.name: 对抗疾病和毒素时全豁免+2状态加值

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
霍布吉的打击对措手不及的生物额外造成1d6精准伤害。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Strangling Grasp.name: 扼喉抓握 Strangling Grasp
Strangling Grasp.description:
触发 霍布吉使用拳头击打命中一个中型或更小体型的生物；

效果 该生物受到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}，霍布吉开始扼死该生物。该生物陷入窒息，在被扼喉期间无法说话。这会使之无法施放带有语言成分的法术或激活需要命令的物品。

Surprise Attack.name: 突袭打击 Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: 在战斗第一轮中，尚未行动的生物对霍布吉视为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}。

Hobji.allSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. disease and poison

God's Intervention.name: 神力干预 God's Intervention
God's Intervention.description:
触发 灰沼成为物理打击的目标

效果 感觉到灰沼的危机，伊多维克传送至他身边，为灰沼挡下危险。伊多维克传送至邻接灰沼的空间，用身体护住灰沼。伊多维克成为触发此能力的打击的目标。

Independent Action.name: 独立行动 Independent Action
Independent Action.description: 伊多维克比大多数萨克利斯神都更加古老、强大，他知道如何在没有唤神者的情况下以某些形态显现。伊多维克不与灰沼共享先攻、动作、HP和多重攻击减值。

Indomitable Step.name: 不屈步伐 Indomitable Step
Indomitable Step.description: 伊多维克无视困难地形和不稳地面，并视高等困难地形为困难地形。

Otherworldly Roar.name: 异界咆哮 Otherworldly Roar
Otherworldly Roar.description: 伊多维克发出强大的吼声，同时用蹄子踏地，展示自己的獠牙。伊多维克进行威吓检定，对30尺范围内的每个敌人进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize}。该检定不因语言不通而承受减值。

Rampaging Charge.name: 横冲直撞 Rampaging Charge
Rampaging Charge.description: 伊多维克向前冲锋，利用冲力强化自己的攻击。伊多维克行走两次，然后进行一次獠牙打击。只要他至少移动了20尺，攻击检定就获得2环境加值。被此攻击击中的中型或更小体型的生物须通过@Check[type:reflex|dc:25]豁免，否则会因这一击的力量@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Spirit Link.name: 精神连结 Spirit Link
Spirit Link.description: 即使这种连结并非普通的连结，伊多维克依然束缚于自己的召唤师；他必须始终处于灰沼的100尺范围内。如果他离开该范围或HP降低至0伊多维克的物理形态就会消散。由于他的连结效果不同寻常，且他不与灰沼共享HP在灰沼@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}或死后伊多维克依然能够显现，只要他待在灰沼躯体周围。如果灰沼死亡，伊多维克的形体会在1分钟后消散。被解消后，伊多维克必须被显现才能再度出现。

Companion Bond.name: Companion Bond
Companion Bond.description: When Ivarsa uses a teleportation effect while she's riding a mount, the mount teleports with her.

Capture Magic.name: Capture Magic
Capture Magic.description:
Trigger Ivarsa succeeds at a save against a foe's harmful spell, or a foe fails a spell attack roll against her with a harmful spell

Effect Ivarsa enters her Arcane Cascade. If she's already in Arcane Cascade, she gains a +2 status bonus to damage from Arcane Cascade until the end of her next turn.

Child of Winter.name: Child of Winter
Child of Winter.description: When Jesseri Casts a Spell that deals damage and doesn't have a duration, she deals additional cold damage that's equal to the spell's level and ignores cold resistance 10.

Signature Spells.name: Signature Spells
Signature Spells.description: Jesseri can heighten @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{Lightning Bolt} to any level for which she has an available spell slot.

Kadlaka.name: 卡拉卡鸦人 Kadlaka
Kadlaka.publicNotes: 卡拉卡鸦人是强壮、瘦长的人形生物，长着乌鸦一样的特征，集才华横溢的猎人和空中侦察兵于一身，更不用说他们召雷引电的强大魔力了。尽管惧怕大多数类人动物，卡拉卡鸦人却很容易与乌鸦和其他鸟类建立友谊，有时它们会与那些证明自己有能力掌控野生动物和事物的自然秩序的人建立暂时的联盟。当他们安顿下来——无论是只停留一个季节还是一生——卡拉卡鸦人通常把自己定位为自然景观或当地鸟群的守护者。由于卡拉卡鸦人的自然形态可能会吓到类人生物旅行者，因此它们经常伪装成人类或其他共同的类人生物族裔来获取信息和传递警告。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
卡拉卡鸦人能将其外表变形为中型类人生物。这不会改变它的速度或打击的攻击骰和伤害骰，但会改变其打击的伤害类型（例如钝击）。在类人形态下，卡拉卡鸦人无法使用振翅能力。每个卡拉卡鸦人都有一个固定的类人形态，它无法在每次使用该能力时变为不同外貌的类人生物。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Silent Lightning.name: 无声闪电 Silent Lightning
Silent Lightning.description: 卡拉卡鸦人移动时非常安静。当它们试图避免被某个生物听到时，它们的隐秘检定有+4环境加值。和通常一样，它们的隐秘DC也有此加值。

Wingbeat.name: 振翅 Wingbeat
Wingbeat.description:
卡拉卡鸦人以雷霆之势扇动翅膀@Template[type:emanation|distance:15]范围内的生物受到[[/r (5d6)[sonic]]]{5d6音波伤害}（@Check[type:fortitude|dc:21|basic:true]豁免）。如果豁免失败，生物还会被推离卡拉卡鸦人5尺。

卡拉卡鸦人在[[/br 1d4 #Wingbeat Recharge]]{1d4轮}内无法使用该能力。

Lagofir.name: 拉戈菲 Lagofir
Lagofir.publicNotes:
拉戈菲是一种半水生的杂食性动物，类似于一只大狗大小的兔子。它们是群居动物，顽皮但有领地意识，会保护自己的亲族。拉戈菲以家庭为单位生活，在周围环境允许的情况下尽可能地聚成更大的群落。它们常见于阿维斯坦北部，通常聚集在河流、湖泊和海岸，以鱼类、甲壳类动物、海洋植物和小型哺乳动物为食。

拉戈菲身体健壮，背部呈圆形，有着粗壮的后腿、长长的耳朵和一条又短又蓬松的尾巴。它们强力的门牙能够穿透蛤壳、甲壳质和骨头。它们的前爪和后爪都有蹼，前爪非常灵巧，能够抓住物体并执行简单的操作任务。

拉戈菲会分泌一种厚厚的、有甜味的、易燃的油，覆盖在它们的皮毛上。这种油摸起来很温暖，能在寒冷的水和寒冷的气候中为它们隔绝温度，保持舒适。拉戈菲通过在固体表面上摩擦身体、在表面上涂油来标记自己的领地，对其他拉戈菲来说，油可以用来识别不同的个体。这使得它们的巢穴变得极其危险。在拉戈菲巢穴里，一点小小的火花就会引发爆炸。

Cold Adaptation.name: 寒冷适应 Cold Adaptation
Cold Adaptation.description: 拉戈菲能将受到的寒冷环境影响减少1阶。

Consuming Fumes.name: 强烈烟气 Consuming Fumes
Consuming Fumes.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:15]{15尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

尺。拉戈菲被其渗出的可燃油散发的烟气环绕着。在灵光范围内，每种火把大小或更大的非魔法明火都会爆炸，对邻接火焰的每个生物和物体造成@Damage[4d4[fire]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:17|basic:true]豁免）。爆炸过后，火源会消失。

Flammable.name: 可燃 Flammable
Flammable.description: 拉戈菲会分泌一种温暖、可燃的油。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}拉戈菲或被拉戈菲擒抱或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}的生物身上会沾上油，持续10分钟或直至花费1分钟大力擦洗把油洗掉为止。每当身上有油的拉戈菲或其他生物受到火焰伤害，它都会着火，承受[[/r 1d6[persistent,fire]]]伤害。

Gnaw.name: 啮咬 Gnaw
Gnaw.description:
需求 拉戈菲的上一个动作是成功的啃咬打击；

效果 拉戈菲咬住目标，把牙齿深深扎进猎物。目标承受@Damage[(1d8+3)[piercing]]伤害。

Nimble Rush.name: 敏捷冲刺 Nimble Rush
Nimble Rush.description: 拉戈菲一边在敌人周围飞奔一边发动攻击。拉戈菲行走两次，在移动过程中的任一时刻进行打击。它可以把任意一次行走替换为游泳。

Loblobi.name: 洛洛比河精 Loblobi
Loblobi.publicNotes:
在第一世界，河流并不总是如人们所期望的那样流动；有时它们会逆流而上，有时又会消失在雾中，然后在另一个地方完全重现。这些河流中土生土长的精类也常常反复无常。这种特性在洛洛比河精身上尤为明显，它们是一种狡猾的食肉生物，长得像胖乎乎的小型类人生物，却长着冠鹭的头和翅膀。

这些恶意的骗子特别爱搞那些会导致其他生物尴尬，受伤，甚至淹死的恶作剧。他们最常见的“恶作剧”是在对一个希望过河的人施放水面行走，当他们的受害者走到河中心的时候，魔法就突然消失。相反，当它们成为人们的笑柄时，大多数洛洛比河精都非常开不起玩笑。大家都知道，很少有生物能像洛洛比河精一样记仇。

它们特别虚荣，喜欢不停地拍打和跳舞来炫耀它们的羽毛。如果不去赞美一个正在打扮的洛洛比河精的外表肯定会招致永远的敌意，而拍马屁也许可以让人赢得足够的时间，从邪恶的精类面前溜走。

Unflappable Self-Importance.name: 镇定自负 Unflappable Self-Importance
Unflappable Self-Importance.description:
当洛洛比河精成功尝试意志检定，以对抗情绪效果或将会导致它被控制的效果时，它得到大成功的结果。如果它在对抗上述效果时大失败，它得到失败的结果。

但是，洛洛比河精对马屁没有任何抵抗力。当有人尝试用欺骗或交涉检定对其撒谎、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{建立印象 Make an Impression}、提出请求时，它们的意志DC和察觉DC有-4环境减值。

Arrogant Preen.name: 傲慢自大 Arrogant Preen
Arrogant Preen.description:
洛洛比河精整理自己的羽冠，让自己看起来非常高贵。@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺}内每个非精类的生物必须尝试@Check[type:will|dc:17]豁免，然后对傲慢自大临时免疫1小时。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标被分神，直到它的下个回合开始，它无法使用反应动作。

失败 目标被洛洛比河精@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}，并且无法使用反应动作1分钟。

大失败 类似失败。此外，当生物被迷魂时，洛洛比河精的任何敌对动作不会解除迷魂状态，但这允许目标在它的回合开始时尝试一次新的意志豁免来结束此效果。

Aura of Courage.name: Aura of Courage
Aura of Courage.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:15] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Whenever Lomok becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}, reduce the condition value by 1 (minimum 0). At the end of his turn, when he would reduce his frightened condition value by 1, also reduce the value by 1 for all allies in his aura.

Powerful Will.name: Powerful Will
Powerful Will.description: When Lomok rolls a success on a Will save, he gets a critical success instead.

Retributive Strike.name: Retributive Strike
Retributive Strike.description:
Trigger An enemy damages one of Lomok's allies, and both combatants are within 15 feet of him

Effect Lomok shields his ally and calls for retribution upon the attacker. The ally reduces the triggering damage by 13. Lomok and any allies within reach of the triggering enemy can make melee Strikes against it.

Shield Block.name: Shield Block
Shield Block.description:
Trigger While you have your shield raised, you would take damage from a physical attack

You snap your shield in place to ward off a blow. Your shield prevents you from taking an amount of damage up to the shield's Hardness. You and the shield each take any remaining damage, possibly breaking or destroying the shield.

Spurred by Death.name: Spurred by Death
Spurred by Death.description:
Trigger An ally within 30 feet reduces a creature to 0 HP

Effect Lomok Steps, Strides, or Strikes.

Oath of the Burning Mammoths.name: Oath of the Burning Mammoths
Oath of the Burning Mammoths.description: Lomok's melee Strikes deal an additional @Damage[1d10[persistent,fire]] damage. If he critically hits a creature with a melee Strike, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for as long as it takes persistent fire damage.

Long-horned Bison.name: 长角野牛 Long-horned Bison
Long-horned Bison.publicNotes: 与它们体型较小的近亲野牛（怪物图鉴3第32页）一样，长角野牛也是一种有着短脸、两根角、蓬松的毛发、背上有着明显隆起的牛类。然而，尽管与较为温和的野牛有着亲缘关系，长角野牛却脾气很坏，领地意识极强。它们的脚步声撼动地面，踩踏的响声可能会被误认为是地震。长角野牛最重可达4500磅，最高可达9尺，最长可达16尺。它们的两根角的尖端距离甚至可以与其身高几乎相等。

Cold Adaptation.name: 寒冷适应 Cold Adaptation
Cold Adaptation.description: 野牛能将受到的寒冷环境影响减少1阶。

Toss.name: 甩角 Toss
Toss.description:
触发 一个生物在野牛的角抵打击触及范围内结束移动；

效果 野牛试图用角推撞触发该反应的生物。野牛在获得成功或大成功后无法行走。

Pointed Charge.name: 莽牛突击 Pointed Charge
Pointed Charge.description: 野牛犄角低垂，直冲向它的敌人。它行走两次。如果野牛结束移动时在一个敌人的近战触及范围内，野牛对该敌人进行一次角抵打击。该次打击获得夺命D12特征。

Rolling Thunder.name: 雷霆奔踏 Rolling Thunder
Rolling Thunder.description: 野牛冲锋时尘土飞扬，大地震颤。奔踏的野牛最多以两倍速度进行一次直线行走，对路径上所有体型不大于大型的生物造成@Damage[(4d8+8)[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true]豁免）。多个野牛可以共同参与雷霆奔踏，只需要花费能力所需的动作然后等待整个牛群准备完毕。在它们的下个回合开始前，当一只相邻的野牛开始雷霆奔踏时，能触发它的反应动作开始协同冲锋。所有协同冲锋的野牛必须采用平行的直线路径，所以覆盖的区域不会彼此交叉。协同冲锋会对区域内的生物造成额外@Damage[3d8[bludgeoning]]伤害，反射豁免失败的生物还会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Long-horned Bison Beheaded.name: 长角野牛活化头颅 Long-horned Bison Beheaded

Toss.name: 甩头 Toss
Toss.description:
需求 活化头颅的上一个动作是角击打击，对目标造成伤害；

效果 活化头颅甩头，试图把目标生物移动到它的角触及范围内的另一处空间。它进行运动检定，对抗目标的强韧DC。失败的情况下，目标停留在原地。

Megaloceros.name: 大角麋鹿 Megaloceros
Megaloceros.publicNotes: 大角麋鹿与麋鹿形态相似，但提醒却要大得多。通常的雄性都是高大的生物，仅鹿角就接近100磅重。这些鹿角非常巨大，并且其宽度可能要胜过它们的体长。大角麋鹿站立时高达9英尺，重达1500磅，鹿角超过12英尺宽。

Furious Charge.name: 愤怒猛冲 Furious Charge
Furious Charge.description: 大角麋鹿行走两次，然后进行一次蹄踢打击。如果此次打击命中，它造成额外@Damage[2d4[bludgeoning]]伤害。

Methane Flue.name: Methane Flue
Methane Flue.disable: @Check[type:survival|dc:28|name:Diffuse the Flames|traits:environmental,hazard] to dig around the vent in a way that diffuses the fumes
Methane Flue.hazarddescription: Invisible but highly flammable natural gas has built up beneath the ground, where geological pressure can ignite it.

Flame Spurt.name: Flame Spurt
Flame Spurt.description:
Trigger A creature moves within 5 feet of the flue

Effect A fiery geyser of flaming gas explodes from the ground. Creatures within 5 feet of the flue take @Damage[4d10[fire]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true]); creatures that fail the save also take @Damage[4d10[persistent,fire]] damage.

Dual Deny Advantage.name: Dual Deny Advantage
Dual Deny Advantage.description: Due to his dual nature with Xeleria, Metuak is never @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}.

Axe Master.name: Axe Master
Axe Master.description: Metuak has access to the critical specialization effect of axe weapons. Due to his hatchet's grievous rune, he can damage a third creature with the same restrictions.

Dual Soul.name: Dual Soul
Dual Soul.description: A demon named Xeleria is bound to Metuak's soul. Though the two entities share one body and are a single creature for the purpose of both targeted and area effects, Metuak and Xeleria each have 120 Hit Points. Damage to each is tracked separately. Xeleria's HP is reduced by force, good, and positive damage, and any damage from a cold iron weapon, a weapon with a ghost touch rune, and any damage originating from the Primordial Flame. All other damage reduces Metuak's HP.Metuak and Xeleria must both be reduced to 0 HP for Metuak to die and Xeleria to be destroyed. If, at the beginning of Metuak's turn, either Metuak or Xeleria has been reduced to 0 HP but the other hasn't, Metuak and Xeleria each regain 15 HP.

Shadow Blend.name: Shadow Blend
Shadow Blend.description: Metuak Strides up to twice his Speed. If he ends his movement in an area of dim light, he is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} as long as he remains in dim light.

Soul Swipe.name: Soul Swipe
Soul Swipe.description: Metuak makes a single hatchet or claw Strike and compares the result to the AC of up to four foes, each of whom must be within his reach. He rolls damage once and applies it to each creature he hits. A Soul Swipe counts as two attacks for his multiple attack penalty. Metuak's hatchet applies its sweep trait against all four targets.

Terrifying Howl.name: Terrifying Howl
Terrifying Howl.description: Metuak unleashes a terrifying howl, attempting to Demoralize each creature within 30 feet. These creatures are then immune to Terrifying Howl for 1 minute.

Necrohusk.name: 死灵躯壳 Necrohusk
Necrohusk.publicNotes:
死灵躯壳是一种跳跃的不死怪物，是类人生物通过死灵实验被故意扭曲成一个新的生物时产生的。与塑肉体和成功的亡灵移植体不同，成为死灵躯壳的都是没能活过实验过程的。在被复活后，它们就成为了狡诈的、动物一般的生物，只会无条件服从造主的命令。

创造死灵躯壳非常困难，容易出错的地方很多。大多数尝试的结果都是无用的、腐烂的泥浆或畸形的不死生物，它们并不比普通的僵尸更聪明或危险。时间成本、实验对象和昂贵的法术材料使得一些死灵法师认为，这些成果不值得他们冒这个风险。有时，施法者可以在实验过程中利用负能量位面减少金钱成本，但同时会极大增加危险，最终往往会产生反冲，造成施法者死亡，留下一个没有主人的死灵躯壳。

在苏塔基人中，只有灰沼和他的副手图凯克与阿兹拥有经常性地创造死灵躯壳的知识和技能。不过图凯克的兴趣经常把他引向别处，而不进行如此残忍的行为。死灵躯壳的材料来自灰沼教派的志愿者，或是背叛灰沼的苏塔基人。灰沼希望以这种可怖的命运来惩罚他们。

Skitter.name: 跑动 Skitter
Skitter.description:
触发 一个生物的近战打击未能击中死灵躯壳；

效果 死灵躯壳进行快步。

Frenzied Assault.name: 狂暴攻击 Frenzied Assault
Frenzied Assault.description: 死灵躯壳进行三次腿踢打击。如果多于一次打击命中同一目标，将击中目标的打击合并计算伤害，只应用一次目标生物的弱点与抗力。

Impaling Lunge.name: 穿刺猛扑 Impaling Lunge
Impaling Lunge.description: 死灵躯壳行走两次。如果死灵躯壳结束移动时处于敌人的近战攻击范围内，它对该敌人进行一次腿踢打击。击中的情况下，该次打击额外造成@Damage[1d6[bleed]]伤害。

Vile Innards.name: 污秽内脏 Vile Innards
Vile Innards.description: 死灵躯壳在进行脓液喷吐打击时会把它的一部分腐烂的内脏吐出去。大成功的情况下，目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}。

Oil Explosion.name: 拉戈菲油爆炸 Oil Explosion
Oil Explosion.disable: @Check[type:survival|dc:25|name:Neutralize the oil|traits:hazard,environmental,fire](受训)生存（受训）或@Check[type:crafting|dc:23|name:Neutralize the oil|traits:hazard,environmental,fire]以除去这些油而不使之点燃。
Oil Explosion.hazarddescription: 易燃的油着起火来，引发爆炸，形成一团火球。

Explode.name: 爆炸 Explode
Explode.description:
触发 明火被带入区域A4

效果 墙上的拉戈菲油爆炸，对区域A4和A3的所有生物和物体造成@Damage[(4d8+10)[fire]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:21|traits:hazard,environmental,fire|basic:true]豁免）。

strike-Tallow Bomb.name: 油脂炸弹 Tallow Bomb
strike-Tallow Bomb.description:
[[/r (2d4)[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}

[[/r (2)[splash,fire]]]{2溅射火焰伤害}

Spurred by Death.name: 死亡激励 Spurred by Death
Spurred by Death.description:
触发 30尺内一个盟友将一个生物的生命值降为0；

效果 帕卡诺行走或快步。

Hunt Prey.name: 猎杀目标 Hunt Prey
Hunt Prey.description:
帕卡诺指定一个他能看到且听到，或一个他正追踪的生物为猎物。他在用于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek}猎物的察觉检定和用于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{追踪 Track}猎物的生存检定上获得+2环境加值。

当帕卡诺在一回合内第一次命中指定的猎物时，他额外造成[[/r (1d8)[precision]]]{1d8精准伤害}。帕卡诺还会在对抗猎物时忽略远程攻击的第二个射程增量减值。

这些效果持续到帕卡诺再次使用猎杀目标。

Spear Fighter.name: 矛斗士 Spear Fighter
Spear Fighter.description: 帕卡诺的矛具有格挡武器特征，并在被他用于打击时造成额外[[/r (1d6}]]{1d6伤害}。如果他使用矛对一个生物造成重击，该生物直到帕卡诺下回合开始前陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}。

Death Throes.name: Death Throes
Death Throes.description: When a frost worm dies, it explodes in a @Template[type:burst|distance:100] of searing cold blood. All creatures and objects in range take @Damage[10d8[cold]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true] save).

Human Cunning.name: Human Cunning
Human Cunning.description: Pakano's allies are unaffected by his worm chill aura and Worm Trill, and his Freezing Blood affects random enemies instead of random creatures. His Death Throes, however, still affect all creatures and objects in a 100-foot burst.

Worm Chill.name: Worm Chill
Worm Chill.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:5]{5 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

A creature that enters or begins its turn in the emanation takes @Damage[3d6[cold]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true]).

Worm Trill.name: Worm Trill
Worm Trill.description:
The frost worm emits a hypnotic trill. Each non-frost worm creature within 100 feet must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:32] save. The effects of Worm Trill last for 1 round, but if the frost worm uses this ability again on subsequent rounds, it extends this duration by 1 round for any creature already affected.

Success The creature is unaffected and is immune to Worm Trill for 24 hours.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} by the frost worm.

Critical Failure As failure, but the fascinated condition doesn't end if the frost worm uses hostile actions against the creature.

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
The frost worm exhales a blast of frost, dealing @Damage[13d6[cold]] damage to creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:50] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:32|basic:true] save).

It can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

Freezing Blood.name: Freezing Blood
Freezing Blood.description:
Trigger The frost worm takes piercing or slashing damage

Effect The frost worm's freezing blood sprays out on a random creature within 10 feet of the frost worm. That creature takes @Damage[7d6[cold]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true] save).

Pouncing Tiger Haunt.name: 猛虎作祟 Pouncing Tiger Haunt
Pouncing Tiger Haunt.disable: @Check[type:nature|dc:18|name:Quell the Spirit|traits:hazard,haunt](受训)或@Check[type:religion|dc:18|name:Quell the Spirit|traits:hazard,haunt](受训)以平息鬼魂。
Pouncing Tiger Haunt.hazarddescription: 壁画上的巨虎咆哮着活过来，从岩壁上一跃而下发动攻击。
Pouncing Tiger Haunt.reset: 如果壁画未被摧毁，作祟于一天后重置。

Tiger Slash.name: 猛虎挥砍 Tiger Slash
Tiger Slash.description:
触发 一个活物靠近壁画5尺范围内；

效果 作祟使用半固体的利爪造成[[/r (4d8)[slashing]]]{4d8挥砍伤害}（@Check[type:will|dc:18|basic:true]豁免）。豁免失败的情况下，目标还陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}，并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing}1轮（大失败为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}，逃跑1分钟）。

Punishing Altar.name: 责罚祭坛 Punishing Altar
Punishing Altar.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:22|name:Remove the bowl|traits:hazard,magical,necromancy,negative,trap](专家) 在不触发魔法的情况下移开碗，或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（2环，反制DC20）来反制魔法符文
Punishing Altar.hazarddescription: 当有活物靠近而未展示威尼瑟斯圣徽时，碗释放出一股负能量冲击波。
Punishing Altar.stealthdetails: (受训) 来发现碗是魔法陷阱的核心

Necromantic Wave.name: 死灵波动 Necromantic Wave
Necromantic Wave.description:
触发 一个活物靠近碗10尺范围内而未展示威尼瑟斯圣徽；

效果 碗释放出负能量冲击波，对触发的生物和范围内所有未展示威尼瑟斯圣徽的生物造成@Damage[(4d8+10)[negative]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:21|traits:hazard,magical,necromancy,negative,trap|basic:true]豁免）。豁免大失败的情况下，生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}。

Counter-Charge.name: Counter-Charge
Counter-Charge.description:
Trigger A creature Strides within reach of the warrior and critically fails to Strike the warrior with a melee weapon

Effect The rhino warrior knocks the creature to the ground, and the triggering creature falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and takes @Damage[(2d6+5)[bludgeoning]] damage. The rhino warrior is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the end of their next turn.

Dig In.name: Dig In
Dig In.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect The rhino warrior makes two pick Strikes against a creature within reach. The rhino warrior rolls only one attack roll for both Strikes, then compares the result against the creature's AC. The rhino warrior's multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after both Strikes.

Rime Sludge.name: 雾凇泥 Rime Sludge
Rime Sludge.publicNotes:
腐烂和衰败在各种气候下的沼泽中都发挥着自然的作用，而潜在的魔法能量或其他奇怪的现象可以将分解的物质转化为泥怪和其他由活化淤泥构成的怪物。苔原湿地也不外乎如此。更糟糕的是，在这些地区，快速冷冻可以阻止有毒污泥的分解，而连续数年的短期季节性解冻可以让腐殖质堆积，直到产生大量的雾凇泥。这些稀有的有毒泥怪会贪婪地寻找并吞噬它们在北境栖息地找到的任何有机物。

像大多数渗泥怪一样，雾凇泥主要由原生质组成，尽管它们的稠度像淤泥一样，夹杂着令人作呕的难以消化的物质块，比如石化的木头、锯齿状的箭头和动物化石。雾凇泥通过吞食植物和动物来更新原生质，并在其变换形态的半冻结分解过程中保持微妙的平衡。

雾凇泥是少数几种能在寒冷气候中茁壮成长的泥怪之一，而过高的温度会加速它们的自然腐烂。雾凇泥在高于冰点的温度下存活不了几天。气温上升迫使它们迁移到气候更冷的地区或寒冷的地下。

很少有生活在寒冷气候中的智慧生物愿意与雾凇泥扯上任何关系。这些泥怪是无法被驯化的，会随意游走，只要有一点温暖的迹象，就会散发出有毒的臭味。一些有创造力的生物试图把雾凇泥困在坑里，以确保它们被囚禁，并利用它们来处理囚犯或食物残渣。由于泥怪本身的恶臭，这些坑往往相当深。

Motion Sense 60 feet.name: 运动感知60尺
Motion Sense 60 feet.description: 雾凇泥能通过周遭的振动或空气扰动感知附近发生的运动。

Noxious Sublimation.name: 剧毒升腾 Noxious Sublimation
Noxious Sublimation.description: 雾凇泥每轮第一次受到火焰伤害时，一团令人作呕的腐烂毒云会向外升腾，对@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]范围内的所有生物造成[[/r (2d6)[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}（@Check[type:fortitude|dc:17|basic:true]豁免）。豁免失败的生物还会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}（大失败@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 3}）。

Slushy Undulation.name: 泥泞起伏 Slushy Undulation
Slushy Undulation.description: 雾凇泥忽视由冰雪构成的困难地形和高等困难地形，并且在穿越冰面时不会有滑@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}的风险。

Rockfall Ceiling.name: 落岩洞顶 Rockfall Ceiling
Rockfall Ceiling.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:25|name:Pin the pulley in place|traits:hazard,mechanical,trap](受训)用销将滑轮组固定归位
Rockfall Ceiling.hazarddescription: 由绳滑轮组控制的一大堆石块掉落在洞窟的低层。

Drop Rocks.name: 落岩 Drop Rocks
Drop Rocks.description:
触发 握着绳子的生物拉动绳子；

效果 绳网松落，岩石掉落在区域A15低侧的所有生物和物体上，造成@Damage[(4d8+14)[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:26|traits:hazard,mechanical,trap|basic:true]豁免）。

Roru.name: 蹂掠魔 Roru
Roru.publicNotes: 蹂掠魔有时被称为狩猎魔，它们是残忍的魔族，诞生自残忍损毁动物尸体的人的灵魂。作为恶魔，它们会披上动物的毛皮，混进兽群，腐化整个群落，将其受害者变得嗜血而野蛮。

Disobedience Vulnerability.name: 违逆弱点 Disobedience Vulnerability
Disobedience Vulnerability.description: 每轮第一次，在蹂掠魔周围60尺范围内有尝试进行指挥动物的检定失败时，蹂掠魔承受@Damage[4d6[mental]]伤害（如果是蹂掠魔自身失败则为@Damage[10d6[mental]]）。

Predatory Aura.name: 狩猎灵光 Predatory Aura
Predatory Aura.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

进入灵光范围或在灵光范围内结束其回合的动物或魔兽必须通过@Check[type:will|dc:25]豁免，否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}（大失败为惊惧2）。灵光范围内惊惧的动物无法攻击蹂掠魔。对抗狩猎灵光豁免成功的生物对此免疫24小时。

Incite Ferocity.name: 煽起凶性 Incite Ferocity
Incite Ferocity.description: 蹂掠魔将其腐化作用集中于30尺内它能看见的一个动物或魔兽。该生物必须通过@Check[type:will|dc:25]豁免，否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}，持续[[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。困惑的生物无法攻击蹂掠魔。豁免成功的生物免疫该效果24小时。

Wear Pelt.name: 披挂兽皮 Wear Pelt
Wear Pelt.description: 蹂掠魔披上邻接的死亡动物的皮毛，变成它的样子。蹂掠魔变为相同体型，获得目标动物的相同速度。蹂掠魔失去啃咬和爪抓无武装打击，获得目标生物的近战打击方式。打击造成的伤害等同于蹂掠魔的啃咬伤害（具有灵巧特征的则为爪抓打击伤害）。无论如何，伤害类型都与新的无武装打击方式相匹配。蹂掠魔披挂兽皮期间，对蹂掠魔造成的物理伤害有一半作用于兽皮。兽皮有硬度525HP。兽皮HP归零后，蹂掠魔立刻离开兽皮，兽皮被摧毁。

Shattering Rune.name: Shattering Rune
Shattering Rune.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:30|name:Erase the Rune|traits:hazard] (master) to erase the rune without triggering the sensor or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic} (5th level; counteract DC 28) to dispel the rune
Shattering Rune.hazarddescription: A magical rune is inscribed on the tarry earth at the entrance to the hut, buried beneath snow, with an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} sensor that detects creatures within a 10-foot-radius sphere.

Shattering Shockwave.name: Shattering Shockwave
Shattering Shockwave.description:
Trigger A Small or larger creature comes within 10 feet of the rune

Effect The rune unleashes a deafening peal of thunder that deals @Damage[10d8[sonic]] damage in a 20-foot burst (@Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true]).

Skeletal Woolly Rhinoceros.name: 骷髅披毛犀 Skeletal Woolly Rhinoceros

Rhinoceros Charge.name: 犀牛冲锋 Rhinoceros Charge
Rhinoceros Charge.description: 犀牛行走两次，然后进行一次角抵打击。只要犀牛移动至少20尺，打击的伤害增加到@Damage[(3d12+5)[piercing]]。被此攻击击中的中型或更小体型的生物必须通过@Check[type:reflex|dc:22]豁免，否则自动被推撞后退5尺，并因为这一击的力量陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Soul Draining Cage.name: 灵魂汲取牢笼 Soul Draining Cage
Soul Draining Cage.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:25|name:Drain the rune's power|traits:hazard,magical,necromancy,negative,trap](专家)以用无害的方式抽干符文的能量；或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（3环，反制DC22）以反制符文。
Soul Draining Cage.hazarddescription: 牢笼栏杆和锁上雕刻的死灵符文会汲取触碰牢笼的活物的生命力。

Soul Drain.name: 灵魂汲取 Soul Drain
Soul Drain.description:
触发 一个生物直接或使用工具触碰牢笼的栏杆、门或锁；

效果 牢笼对触发生物、牢笼内的生物和临近牢笼的生物造成@Damage[(4d8+18)[negative]]伤害（@Check[type:fortitude|dc:27|traits:hazard,trap|basic:true]豁免）。豁免失败的生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}。

Spectral Archers.name: Spectral Archers
Spectral Archers.disable: @Check[type:intimidation|dc:31|traits:haunt,hazard](专家)to cow the archers into fleeing or @Check[type:religion|dc:28|name:Banish the Spirits|traits:haunt,hazard](专家)to temporarily banish the spirits
Spectral Archers.hazarddescription: Ghostly soldiers wielding crossbows manifest within the towers that flank the gatehouse and rain bolts down upon intruders.
Spectral Archers.reset: The haunt vanishes permanently if the graveknights are destroyed. Otherwise, it returns after 1 hour.

Routine.name: Routine
Routine.description: (1 action) The hazard fires one bolt at every creature in a 30-foot-by-30-foot area in front of the gate as 1 action. Because the spectral archers fire bolts continuously, the haunt can also use the Continuous Barrage free action (below) to fire bolts at each creature during that creature's turn.

Continuous Barrage.name: Continuous Barrage
Continuous Barrage.description:
Trigger A creature in front of the gate finishes an action

Effect The haunt makes a spectral bolt Strike against the triggering creature.

Rain of Bolts.name: Rain of Bolts
Rain of Bolts.description:
Trigger A creature attacks the graveknights in area G1 or enters the castle

Effect The haunt makes a spectral bolt Strike against the triggering creature, then rolls initiative.

Summer Hora.name: Summer Hora
Summer Hora.languages: Speak with Animals, Speak with Plants

Summer Bound.name: Summer Bound
Summer Bound.description: During the winter months, a summer hora can't take reactions, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}, and can't reduce their sickened condition below 1.

Solstice Dependent.name: Solstice Dependent
Solstice Dependent.description: An hora is mystically bonded to a natural location with a simple astronomical calendar that marks the summer and winter solstice. If they aren't at that location at dawn when the sunlight touches the calendar, they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, increasing the value by 1 for each missed day and reducing by 1 only when they witness dawn's light touch the calendar. Even on a cloudy day, there's enough sunlight to satisfy the hora's need. An hora can perform a 24-hour ritual to bond to a new location.

Summer's Salvation.name: Summer's Salvation
Summer's Salvation.description:
Trigger The summer hora or an ally within 30 feet that the summer hora can see fails a Perception check or saving throw

Effect If it's the month of the summer solstice, the hora's or ally's check retroactively gains a +4 status bonus, which can change the outcome from a critical failure to a failure or a failure to a success. If it's the month before or after the summer solstice, the check gains a retroactive +2 status bonus instead. In the other months except during the three winter solstice months, the check gains a retroactive +1 status bonus instead. During the winter solstice months, this ability has no effect. The summer hora can't use Summer's Fortune again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Summer Hora Queen.name: Summer Hora Queen
Summer Hora Queen.languages: Speak with Animals, Speak with Plants

Summer Bound.name: Summer Bound
Summer Bound.description: During the winter months, a summer hora can't take reactions, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}, and can't reduce their sickened condition below 1.

Focus Beauty.name: Focus Beauty
Focus Beauty.description: The hora queen focuses her beauty upon a target within her aura. The creature must attempt a Will save. On a failure, it is affected as if by the hora queen's nymph's beauty aura; if it was already affected by the aura, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} until its sight is restored via restore senses or similar effect, or until the hora queen chooses to remove the effect using a single action, which has the concentrate trait. A hora queen can Focus Beauty on a given creature only once per turn.

Summer's Salvation.name: Summer's Salvation
Summer's Salvation.description:
Trigger The summer hora or an ally within 30 feet that the summer hora can see fails a Perception check, saving throw, attack roll, or skill check.

Effect If it's the month of the summer solstice, the hora's or ally's check retroactively gains a +4 status bonus, which can change the outcome from a critical failure to a failure or a failure to a success. If it's the month before or after the summer solstice, the check gains a retroactive +2 status bonus instead. In the other months except during the three winter solstice months, the check gains a retroactive +1 status bonus instead. During the winter solstice months, this ability has no effect. The summer hora can't use Summer's Fortune again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Tied to the Land.name: Tied to the Land
Tied to the Land.description: A summer hora queen is intrinsically tied to a specific region, such as a forest or hilly plain. For 3 months around the summer solstice, the environment is supernaturally resilient, allowing the queen to automatically attempt to counteract spells and rituals that would harm the environment, such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7yWXx3qC4eFNHhxD]{Blight}, with a +27 counteract modifier and a counteract level of 7. For the 3 months around the winter solstice, however, her warded region becomes twisted or unhealthy unless a winter hora queen is present.

Syarstik Painted-Tiger.name: 绘虎萨斯提克 Syarstik Painted-Tiger
Syarstik Painted-Tiger.blurb: 雄性被唤醒的剑齿虎幽灵

Site Bound.name: 束缚之地 Site Bound
Site Bound.description:
萨斯提克无法离开红猫洞，他几乎很少离开E9区。

典型的灵魂通常只能距离在他被杀死或作祟的地点很近的区域逗留。这个限制一般为120尺远。部分幽灵会被限制在对他来说具有特殊意义的房间、建筑、物品或生物上，而非具体的某个地点。

Rejuvenation.name: 复生 Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: 当萨斯提克被摧毁时，他会在[[/br 2d4 #Syarstik Rejuvenation]]{2d4天}后在E9区重新生成，生命值全满。萨斯提克只能由未被附身的原初之火持有者永久性摧毁。

Awaken Painting.name: 唤醒壁画 Awaken Painting
Awaken Painting.description:
萨斯提克令60尺内一幅洞穴壁画活化10分钟。壁画与幽灵间的联系显而易见，因为它会模仿萨斯提克的动作。由于这些动作的怪异性，在活化壁画10尺内，除萨斯提克外的任何生物都陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}。萨斯提克能通过幽灵牙对一幅洞穴壁画10尺内的任何生物进行打击；对于此次打击，目标适用于其对洞穴壁画的掩蔽，而非对萨斯提克的掩蔽。

一个与活化壁画相邻的生物可以花费2个动作尝试@Check[type:occultism|dc:18|name:Compel Awakend Painting|traits:concentrate|overrideTraits:true]或@Check[type:religion|dc:18|name:Compel Awakend Painting|traits:concentrate|overrideTraits:true]检定（以迫使活化壁画的力量衰弱）或@Check[type:crafting|dc:20|name:Smear the Cave Painting|traits:concentrate|overrideTraits:true]或@Check[type:thievery|dc:20|name:Smear the Cave Painting|traits:concentrate|overrideTraits:true]检定（以彻底破坏这幅壁画）。若成功，该壁画将被破坏，活化效应也会停止。无论如何，此动作具有专注特征。

摧毁三幅活化壁画将平息萨斯提克的愤怒，使这大猫停止攻击。

Pounce.name: 猛扑 Pounce
Pounce.description: 萨斯提克在行走后衔接一次打击。若萨斯提克在执行此动作前处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}状态，则它保持藏匿直到该次打击结束。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
萨斯提克对措手不及的生物造成额外1d6精准伤害。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Motion Sense.name: Motion Sense
Motion Sense.description: A tar ooze can sense nearby motion through vibration and movement.

Viscous Sludge.name: Viscous Sludge
Viscous Sludge.description: The tar ooze can have up to eight creatures grappled at the same time; doing so doesn't prevent it from making pseudopod Strikes. A tar ooze can climb on ceilings and other inverted surfaces, though such surfaces are difficult terrain.

Zombification.name: Zombification
Zombification.description: A creature slain while engulfed by a tar ooze undergoes a horrifying transformation and crawls from the ooze a week later as a tar zombie.

Sticky.name: Sticky
Sticky.description:
Trigger The tar ooze is hit by a melee attack

Effect The ooze attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} the creature that hit it. The ooze must still spend an action to extend the duration of the Grab on subsequent rounds, as normal.

Tar Pit.name: Tar Pit
Tar Pit.disable: @Check[type:survival|dc:25|name:Reveal the Tar Pit|traits:environmental,hazard](专家)to disturb the surface and reveal the tar pit
Tar Pit.hazarddescription: A 15-foot-wide patch of tar covered with dirt and leaves attempts to capture creatures that step onto it.
Tar Pit.reset: Though the hazard still captures anyone who touches it, the surface doesn't become hidden again until it settles, which takes 24 hours.
Tar Pit.routine: (1 action) On its initiative, the tar pit pulls down each creature within it, thick tar adhering to the creature's body. A creature that was submerged up to its waist becomes submerged up to its neck, and a creature that was submerged up to its neck is pulled under and must hold its breath to avoid suffocation. A creature in the tar pit can attempt a @Check[type:athletics|dc:33] check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} to either raise itself by one step (if it's submerged to its neck or full submerged) or to move 5 feet if it's submerged only up to its waist. On a critical failure, the creature is pulled down one step. Other creatures can Aid the creature, typically by using a rope or similar aid or by attempting to pull the creature out with their own @Check[type:athletics|dc:33] check, with the same results as if the creature attempted the check. In addition to the usual results, a character adjacent to the tar pit who critically fails while Aiding moves into the tar pit. A creature that Climbs out of the tar pit escapes the hazard and lands @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} in an adjacent space.

Capture.name: Capture
Capture.description:
Trigger A Huge or smaller creature walks onto the tar pit

Effect The triggering creature sinks into the tar pit up to its waist. The tar pit rolls initiative if it hasn't already.

Flammable.name: Flammable
Flammable.description: A tar zombie requires a successful DC 20 flat check to recover from persistent fire damage. This DC isn't reduced for assisted recovery.

Fling.name: Fling
Fling.description:
Requirements The tar zombie mammoth has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} by its trunk

Effect The tar zombie mammoth whips its prey violently into the air. It attempts an @Check[type:athletics|defense:fortitude] check against the grabbed or restrained creature's Fortitude DC. If the creature is restrained, the mammoth gains a +4 circumstance bonus to this check. On a success, the mammoth flings the creature up to 30 feet overhead and up to 30 feet away (the creature takes damage from the fall as normal, up to 15 damage for a 30-foot fall). If the flung creature lands on another creature, the creature it lands on takes the same amount of bludgeoning damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true] save).

Shambling Trample.name: Shambling Trample
Shambling Trample.description: As @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.UNah0bxXxkcZjxO3]{Trample}, but the tar zombie mammoth Strides up to its Speed instead of double its Speed.

Vomit Tar.name: Vomit Tar
Vomit Tar.description: The tar zombie vomits a gout of sticky tar in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] that deals @Damage[7d6[bludgeoning]] damage ((@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]) save). Creatures that fail the save are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and gain fire weakness 5. Both conditions end after 3 rounds or when the tar is scrubbed off (which requires 3 Interact actions). The tar zombie can't Vomit Tar again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Vomit Tar]]{1d4 rounds}.

Flammable.name: Flammable
Flammable.description: A tar zombie requires a successful DC 20 flat check to recover from persistent fire damage. This DC isn't reduced for assisted recovery.

Tar-Splattered Charge.name: Tar-Splattered Charge
Tar-Splattered Charge.description: The tar zombie predator lurches at its foe. It Strides twice and makes a claw Strike, or strides once and makes two claw Strikes. Both Strikes count toward its multiple attack penalty as normal. It can't make a Tar-Spattered Charge again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Vomit Tar.name: Vomit Tar
Vomit Tar.description: The tar zombie vomits a gout of sticky tar in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] that deals @Damage[6d6[bludgeoning]] damage ((@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true]) save). Creatures that fail the save are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and gain fire weakness 5. Both conditions end after 3 rounds or when the tar is scrubbed off (which requires 3 Interact actions). The tar zombie can't Vomit Tar again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Vomit Tar]]{1d4 rounds}.

Flammable.name: Flammable
Flammable.description: A tar zombie requires a successful DC 20 flat check to recover from persistent fire damage. This DC isn't reduced for assisted recovery.

Vomit Tar.name: Vomit Tar
Vomit Tar.description: The tar zombie vomits a gout of sticky tar in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] that deals @Damage[5d6[bludgeoning]] damage ((@Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true]) save). Creatures that fail the save are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and gain fire weakness 5. Both conditions end after 3 rounds or when the tar is scrubbed off (which requires 3 Interact actions). The tar zombie can't Vomit Tar again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Vomit Tar]]{1d4 rounds}.

Throttled Blindheim.name: 被扼的盲蛙 Throttled Blindheim
Throttled Blindheim.publicNotes:
盲蛙居住在潮湿的地下洞穴中，形似矮壮的类人生物，有着巨大的青蛙般的头和球状的眼睛。它们的眼睛总是散发着柔和的光芒，不过盲蛙能够收起平时复盖着眼睛的厚膜，使其发出宛如白昼一般明亮的强光。这些单纯的生物利用它们的光线吸引或是迷惑猎物，主要都是些蜥蜴、啮齿类、鱼类这样的小动物。不过，它们也可能会为了喂养幼崽而去追逐更大的猎物。当它们遇到体型与自己相当或是更大的生物时，它们会选择撤退，并在必要的时候闪烁自己的眼睛来帮助逃跑。它们通常会成对或是组成小群体来狩猎。它们利用光线在远距离相互协同，慢慢靠近作为目标的猎物。在一种常规的狩猎模式中，一只盲蛙深潜到水里，利用光线将鱼驱赶到水面，此时另一只待在上面的一把抓起鱼儿，把它们摔到地上，等着稍后慢慢品尝。

盲蛙在潮湿的洞穴里安家，尤其是那些靠近地下湖泊或沼地的洞穴。一个理想的巢穴应当是一个温暖的洞穴，有着许多可食用的菌类，一些鱼儿在湖里游动，令人感到欣慰的水滴从天花板上滴落。盲蛙喜欢平静安宁的生活，即使当它们方才降生到世界上时也只会发出最为柔和的声音。一只盲蛙在闪光中出生，它的父母爱抚地抱在它身上来使光线变暗，以免吸引到捕食者。

并非只有动物才会危及到盲蛙。地底的人们发现这些生物大有用处，并且试图为特殊的目的而捕猎它们。灰矮人把它们当做“突袭蛙”，在盲蛙的头上套上厚实的罩子，而后在突袭的时候突然揭开罩子，以此来致盲它们的敌人。它们有时也将这种生物和缺乏黑暗视觉的奴隶一起送到矿洞中，将其作为光源来使用。卓尔也用它们来做一些相同的事情，一些贵族会把这些生物当做吊灯，把它们吊到大厅的天花板上。无论是灰矮人还是卓尔都不会好好照顾这些被囚禁的生物，所以在被囚禁的情况下，绝大多数的盲蛙都没法撑住多久。

Crushed Windpipes.name: 气管压伤 Crushed Windpipes
Crushed Windpipes.description: 在颈伤恢复前盲蛙无法发声，并陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

Spotlight.name: 聚光 Spotlight
Spotlight.description:
盲蛙眼睛里发出的光芒在@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]范围中提供明亮光照（同时在60尺范围内创造昏暗光照）。每个当盲蛙使用此动作时处于明亮光照范围内的生物，或是在光照持续时间内进入此范围的生物，必须尝试一次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]豁免。而后该生物暂时免疫1小时。这种光照会一直持续，直至盲蛙再次使用此动作来使眼睛变暗。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}1轮。

失败 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

大失败 该生物目盲1小时。

Turkek.name: 图凯克 Turkek
Turkek.blurb: 女性人类吸血裔死灵师

Clot.name: 凝血 Clot
Clot.description:
触发 图凯克承受持续流血伤害；

效果 图凯克的血液凝固封住伤口。图凯克下一次从触发此反应的持续流血伤害中恢复的纯骰检定自动成功。

Sanguine Aura.name: 血色灵光 Sanguine Aura
Sanguine Aura.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

尺。在图凯克周围，伤口愈合缓慢，血流速度增快。阻止持续流血伤害的纯骰DC为16而非15。此外，每当灵光内的生物承受持续流血伤害，都要额外受到@Damage[1d6[bleed]]伤害。

Blood Let.name: 放血 Blood Let
Blood Let.description:
需求 图凯克的上一个动作是尖牙打击命中目标；

效果 图凯克的尖牙划开目标的动脉或静脉，造成额外@Damage[(1d6+5)[slashing]]伤害。

Siphon Blood.name: 血液虹吸 Siphon Blood
Siphon Blood.description:
需求 位于图凯克的血色灵光内的一个生物正在承受持续流血伤害；

效果 图凯克将敌人的血液吸进自己体内以治疗自己的伤口，恢复7点HP。

Turkek.allSaves: +2 circumstance to all saves vs. disease

Varilyn \"Vare\" Eridge.name: 瓦里林“瓦雷”·埃里奇 Varilyn "Vare" Eridge

Guide's Warning.name: 引导警告 Guide's Warning
Guide's Warning.description:
当瓦雷进行察觉或生存检定决定先攻时，她可以以一个自由动作警告盟友。瓦雷以视觉或听觉形式警告盟友，使其先攻掷骰获得+1环境加值。根据警告的方式不同，该动作拥有听觉或视觉特征。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.UiISDbCjK6AUDsll]{效果: 引导警告}

Snare Crafting.name: 圈套工艺 Snare Crafting
Snare Crafting.description: 瓦雷可以使用手艺技能制作下列圈套：警报圈套妨碍圈套恼人荆棘圈套（见冒险工具箱），标记圈套信号圈套，以及烟幕圈套。瓦雷每天可以无需消耗材料制作4个圈套，每个圈套需要3个交互动作布设。

Guiding Words.name: 引导话语 Guiding Words
Guiding Words.description:
瓦雷指出30尺范围内一个生物的一项弱点。瓦雷和所有能看到或听到她的盟友对该生物的攻击和伤害掷骰获得+1状态加值，持续到瓦雷的下一回合开始。在此期间，瓦雷击中该生物时，武器和无武装攻击额外增加1d6精准伤害。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.uqjx1bwYduHwwC7d]{效果: 引导话语}

Venexus.name: 威尼瑟斯 Venexus

Freezing Blood.name: 冰结之血 Freezing Blood
Freezing Blood.description:
触发 一个邻接的生物对威尼瑟斯造成了穿刺或者挥砍伤害。

效果 威尼瑟斯的血飞溅到该生物身上，造成@Damage[2d6[cold]]伤害。一个因此受到寒冷伤害的生物被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，持续1轮。

Mist Shroud.name: 雾气环绕 Mist Shroud
Mist Shroud.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

原初之火不断将威尼瑟斯身体散发的冷气进行加热，让龙的周围环绕着一层薄雾。在灵光中的生物处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态，其他生物对该区域内的生物处于隐蔽状态。威尼瑟斯的风暴视野使她能够看穿隐蔽。如果用风吹开灵光，它会在威尼瑟斯的下一回合开始时自动恢复。该灵光会被水压制。

Storm Vision.name: 风暴视野 Storm Vision
Storm Vision.description: 恶劣天气无法妨碍威尼瑟斯的视野；它忽略由雾、浓雾、雨和降雪带来的隐蔽状态。

Breath Weapon.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description: 威尼瑟斯喷出一片霜云，对@Template[type:cone|distance:40]区域内的生物造成@Damage[10d6[cold]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]豁免）。它在经过[[/br 1d4 #Breath Weapon Cooldown]]{1d4轮}之前无法再次使用吐息。

Draconic Frenzy.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
Draconic Frenzy.description: 威尼瑟斯以任意顺序进行两次爪抓打击和一次尾击打击。

Draconic Momentum.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
Draconic Momentum.description: 当威尼瑟斯在一次打击中造成重击时，她立刻为吐息充能。

Ice Climb 30 feet.name: 冰面攀爬30尺
Ice Climb 30 feet.description: 威尼瑟斯可以在冰面上攀爬，如同她拥有所列出数值的攀爬速度。她忽略由冰雪所造成的困难地形和高等困难地形，并且也不会在穿越冰层时坠落。

Shape Ice.name: 塑冰 Shape Ice
Shape Ice.description: 威尼瑟斯重塑一块她所接触到的冰块或是雪块，最多宽10尺。任何站在冰面上的生物必须成功通过一次@Check[type:reflex|dc:15]豁免或者特技检定。一旦失败，该生物将摔倒在冰面上，陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}状态；如果是大失败，则它会从冰面上摔落，同时倒地。

Snuff.name: 闷熄 Snuff
Snuff.description: 威尼瑟斯释放出一阵冻雨，浇灭30尺范围内的一切明火。所有非魔法火焰会自动熄灭。区域内所有承受持续火焰伤害的生物立即进行一次@Check[type:flat|dc:10]检定来结束持续伤害。如果该能力与正在持续的火焰效果重叠，该能力会尝试反制火焰效果。

Venexus.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Venexus's Chosen.name: 威尼瑟斯的选民 Venexus's Chosen

Tail Lash.name: 甩尾 Tail Lash
Tail Lash.description:
触发 一个在选民尾巴打击触及范围内的生物使用一个动作进行打击或是尝试进行技能检定；

效果 威尼瑟斯的选民尝试对触发生物进行一次尾巴打击。如果命中，该生物在触发该反应的行动检定中承受2环境减值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.QqC9xymSXSVunDgl]{效果: 甩尾 (攻击检定)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.4HJJdogS751Z04lD]{效果: 甩尾 (技能检定)}

Change Shape.name: 变形 Change Shape
Change Shape.description: 威尼瑟斯的选民可以在类人形态和混种形态之间切换。当处于混种形态时，选民获得尾巴非武装攻击。

Flurry of Blows.name: 疾风连击 Flurry of Blows
Flurry of Blows.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 威尼瑟斯的选民进行两次非武装打击。如果两次打击均命中同一生物，伤害合并计算抗力与弱点。

Ice Walk.name: 冰上行走 Ice Walk
Ice Walk.description: 威尼瑟斯的选民无视冰雪形成的困难地形和高等困难地形，在冰上不会有坠落的风险。

Powerful Fists.name: 猛力拳头 Powerful Fists
Powerful Fists.description: 威尼瑟斯的选民的拳头打击视为寒铁和银，且在进行致命攻击时不承受减值。

Venexus's Wyrmling.name: 威尼瑟斯的雏龙 Venexus's Wyrmling

Freezing Blood.name: 冰结之血 Freezing Blood
Freezing Blood.description:
触发 一个相邻的生物对雏龙造成了穿刺或者挥砍伤害。

效果 龙的血飞溅到该生物身上，造成@Damage[1d4[cold]]伤害。因此受到寒冷伤害的生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，持续1轮。

Snow Vision.name: 雪域视觉 Snow Vision
Snow Vision.description: 雪不会影响白龙的视野；雏龙无视由降雪带来的隐蔽状态。

Breath Weapon.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description: 雏龙喷出一片霜云，对@Template[type:cone|distance:30]区域内的生物造成@Damage[6d6[cold]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true]豁免）。它在经过[[/br 1d4 #Breath Weapon Cooldown]]{1d4轮}之前无法再次使用吐息。

Draconic Frenzy.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
Draconic Frenzy.description: 雏龙以任意顺序进行两次爪击打击和一次尾巴打击。

Draconic Momentum.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
Draconic Momentum.description: 当雏龙在一次打击中造成重击时，它立刻为吐息充能。

Ice Climb.name: 冰面攀爬 Ice Climb
Ice Climb.description: 白龙可以在冰面上攀爬，如同它拥有所列出数值的攀爬速度。它忽略由冰雪所造成的困难地形和高等困难地形，并且也不会在穿越冰层时坠落。

Aura of Discarded Things.name: Aura of Discarded Things
Aura of Discarded Things.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Items in the emanation can't regain Hit Points unless the effect that attempts to repair them counteracts the aura, which has a counteract level of 5 and a counteract DC of 30.

Debris Shield.name: Debris Shield
Debris Shield.description:
Trigger The weykoward is targeted by an attack from an attacker it can see

Effect The weykoward intercepts the attack with junk, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to its AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses and the attacker is within the weykoward's reach, it can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} the attacker. It doesn't need a hand free to Shove.

Wasting Gaze.name: Wasting Gaze
Wasting Gaze.description:
The weykoward glances at an item of 4 Bulk or less it can see within 30 feet. A creature holding or wearing the object must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:26] save. An unattended item always critically fails this save.

Critical Success The targeted item is unaffected. All of the creature's equipment is immune to Wasting Gaze for 24 hours.

Success The item is unaffected.

Failure The item loses [[/r {10d6}]] Hit Points; this can make the item broken, but it can't reduce the target's Hit Points beyond its Broken Threshold.

Critical Failure The target item loses [[/r {20d6}]] Hit Points. This can't reduce the item below 1 Hit Point.

Cold Tolerant.name: Cold Tolerant
Cold Tolerant.description: Yana treats environmental cold effects as if they were one step less extreme.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: When Yana rolls a success on a Reflex save, he gets a critical success instead.

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description: Yana can transform into an Ulfen human, Tiny fox, or hybrid kitsune form. Using Change Shape counts as creating a disguise for the Impersonate use of Deception. He can remain in any of his forms indefinitely.

Nimble Dodge.name: Nimble Dodge
Nimble Dodge.description:
Trigger Yana is targeted by a melee or ranged attack from an attacker he can see

Effect Yana gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Slow.name: 缓慢 Slow
Slow.description: 丧尸具有永久@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}且无法使用反应动作。

Dual Tusks.name: 双牙戳刺 Dual Tusks
Dual Tusks.description: 丧尸猛犸进行两次象牙打击，两次目标生物不同。此动作在计算多重攻击减值时算一次攻击，且多重攻击减值在两次攻击结束后开始生效。

Impaling Tusks.name: 象牙穿刺 Impaling Tusks
Impaling Tusks.description: 丧尸猛犸对其用象鼻擒抱的一个生物进行一次象牙打击。如果攻击命中，该生物会被穿在猛犸的一根象牙上，使得象鼻可以继续攻击其他目标。每根象牙可以承载两个中型或更小体型的生物。在象牙上穿着其他生物的时候，猛犸仍然可以使用象牙进行攻击。

Grabbing Trunk.name: 鼻卷 Grabbing Trunk
Grabbing Trunk.description: 丧尸猛犸的象鼻攻击命中中型或更小体型的生物后可以将其@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}。它可以带着被擒抱的生物一起移动。

Zombie Megaloceros.name: 丧尸大角鹿 Zombie Megaloceros
Zombie Megaloceros.publicNotes: 大角麋鹿与麋鹿形态相似，但提醒却要大得多。通常的雄性都是高大的生物，仅鹿角就接近100磅重。这些鹿角非常巨大，并且其宽度可能要胜过它们的体长。大角麋鹿站立时高达9英尺，重达1500磅，鹿角超过12英尺宽。

Slow.name: 缓慢 Slow
Slow.description: 丧尸具有永久@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}且无法使用反应动作。

Furious Charge.name: 愤怒猛冲 Furious Charge
Furious Charge.description: 大角麋鹿行走两次，然后进行一次蹄踢打击。如果此次打击命中，它造成额外@Damage[2d4[bludgeoning]]伤害。
